bg.x2d.utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • bg.x2d.utils.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Static, miscellaneous utility methods.
    Since:
    2DX 1.0 (1st Edition)
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

      • keepTempDir

        public static volatile boolean keepTempDir
        If true, the 2DX-GL temp-dir won't be deleted on program exit.

    • Method Detail

      • closeStream

        public static boolean closeStream(InputStream stream)
        Closes the InputStream, catching the exception and returning false on failure. In the case that stream is null, this method will quietly return false.
        Parameters:
        stream - InputStream to close; a null value will cause false to be returned
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if null or otherwise.

      • closeStream

        public static boolean closeStream(OutputStream stream)
        Closes the OutputStream, catching the exception and returning false on failure. In the case that stream is null, this method will quietly return false.
        Parameters:
        stream - OutputStream to close; a null value will cause false to be returned
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if null or otherwise.

      • getFileURL

        public static URL getFileURL(File f)
        Performs the recommended intermediary step of using toURI and then toURL to convert the File object. The MalformedURLException is caught if thrown and null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        f -
        Returns:
        the URL or null on error.

      • writeToTempStorage

        public static File writeToTempStorage(InputStream in,
                      String fileName,
                      boolean useSystem)
                               throws IOException
        Writes the data from the given InputStream to a file of the specified name in Java's default temp-dir. The given InputStream is closed by this method after writing completes.
        Parameters:
        in -
        fileName -
        useSystem - if true, the temp file will go in the standard jav.io.tmpdir instead of the Snap2D common temp-dir, so it will not be removed by the shutdown hook. It will remain in temp storage until either the system or user deletes it.
        Returns:
        a File object representing the newly created temp-file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeToTempStorage

        public static File writeToTempStorage(String text,
                      String fileName,
                      boolean useSystem)
                               throws IOException
        Writes the given String to temporary storage under the given file name.
        Parameters:
        text -
        fileName -
        useSystem - if true, the temp file will go in the standard jav.io.tmpdir instead of the Snap2D common temp-dir, so it will not be removed by the shutdown hook. It will remain in temp storage until either the system or user deletes it.
        Returns:
        a File object representing the newly created temp-file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • removeDirectory

        public static boolean removeDirectory(File dir,
                      boolean delete)
                               throws FileNotFoundException
        Recursively removes all subfiles of the given directory and deletes it if desired.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory to clear/delete.
        delete - removes the now empty directory if true, else it is left alone.
        Returns:
        true if successful. False otherwise.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the given File isn't a directory.

      • arrayDelete

        public static <T> T[] arrayDelete(T[] src,
                  T[] dest,
                  int ind)
        Deletes the object at the specified index of 'src' array by storing its contents in 'dest' minus the index of deletion.
        Parameters:
        src -
        dest - array to store new results in; the length MUST be src.length - 1
        ind -
        Returns:
        the dest array
